0011110001011100 1010100000000000 0 -> sum: 1110010001011100, cout: 0
0001001000000000 0000110011010011 1 -> sum: 0001111011010100, cout: 0
1000100000110000 1111011110110001 0 -> sum: 0111111111100001, cout: 1
1101110111110111 0101100101101101 0 -> sum: 0011011101100100, cout: 1
0100101010000100 1100011010010011 1 -> sum: 0001000100011000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
